policytree 1.0.3
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

All notable changes to policytree will be documented in this file.

The format is based on Keep a Changelog and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

[1.0.3] - 2020-09-13

Fixed

  • Minor modification to C++ pow call to retain CRAN compatibility. #54

[1.0.2] - 2020-09-09

Fixed

  • Speed up prediction on very large test sets. #51

[1.0.1] - 2020-07-13

Added

  • Add support for help(<package-name>) in the R package. #41

[1.0] - 2020-06-22

Added

  • Release 1.0 has been reviewed by the Journal of Open Source Software. review, paper.

Fixed

  • Fix treatment vector categories bug. #22

[0.9.2] - 2020-03-21

Fixed

  • Minor package test modification to retain CRAN compatibility.

[0.9.1] - 2020-03-20

Added

  • Export a convenience function conditional_means
  • Runtime for tree_search is clarified. #6
  • Add an optional approximation parameter to tree_search that allow for skipping points. #5

Fixed

  • Fix predict with multi_causal_forest forest when newdata is supplied. #2
  • Fix a depth 0 base case in tree_search. #4
  • Fix pruning in the recursive case. Note that this code branch was wrong, but it would never result in the wrong tree being returned. #9

[0.9.0] - 2020-01-11

First CRAN release.

[0.1.0] - 2019-12-17

First beta release.

Contents

Developed by Zhengyuan Zhou, Susan Athey, Stefan Wager, Ayush Kanodia, Erik Sverdrup.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
